channel.title: Serenity-X
channel.description:
If you are reading this then that means you are interested in joining my development team. If so then please read the information below.
[color=orange][b][u]Serenity X Development[/u][/b][/color]
[b][u]Website / Webclient Team[/u][/b] If You Are Wanting This Position Please Request Below
[b][u]Source Development Team[/u][/b] This Position Is Highly Ranked For Source Development You Will Receive Co Owner/ Coder Rank 50% Of Donations
[u][b]Mapping Developer[/b][/u] This Is For Developing Places Such As Home Staff Zones Donar Zones Jail Etc. [b][u]Quest Maker[/u][/b] This Will Be For A Quest Maker Who Can Make The Game Really Enjoyable. [b][u]MiniGame Developer[/u][/b]
This Position is to develop Custom MiniGames With Custom Rewards, Also Gambling I Want A Casino To Gamble And This Will Be Ran By Owners,Admins,Coders only.
So Please Join The Online Adventure And Become A Legend.
Owners , Anthrax, Owner-X. Chris

item.title: Serenity-X
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

I’m not trolling? Constructive Criticism. Don’t expect to come onto these forums and not receive it. All I am saying is that people usually don’t like it when you apply for 5 diff development teams, what if you get accepted by all?

Read full topic

item.title: Serenity-X
item.dc:creator: @mintzero4 mintzero4
item.description:
@mintzero4 wrote:

nolan2131:

He is asking for a team, not specifically referring for you to be on that team… “He said request it below.” Does not mean that you have to do everything someone says, especially if you already have your 562 loading 659 that you plan to release. I guess?

Nolan go to hell and stop trolling

Read full topic

item.title: Serenity-X
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

mintzero4:

I would like to be on the Website team

I don’t get you? You go and ask for a Dev Team to basically code a server in the Server Downloads section for you after you stole all the pics from the post etc… Then you decide to tell everyone there to kiss your ass because they would not code it for you. Then I see you posting on every Development Team thread possible for a staff pos? How many servers can you play/ask people to code for you at once?

Read full topic
